title: Lead Management System
description: A system designed to simplify the analysis of employee leads within an organization, providing efficient tracking and management of lead data.

title: Course Management System
description: A Course Management System designed to facilitate learning of the latest programming languages by building a dynamic web application with a user-friendly interface.

title: Weather App
description: A dynamic weather application that provides real-time weather conditions for any city, featuring detailed forecasts and a user-friendly interface built with Python, Django, and modern web technologies.
